children.name: adultery
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not commit adultery.

children.name: am
children.sourceText: I am the Lord thy God, who hath brought thee out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of bondage.

children.name: are
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not make unto thee any graven image, or any likeness of any thing in heaven above, or things which are in the earth beneath.

children.name: ass
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not covet thy neighbor's house, thou shalt not covet thy neighbor's wife, nor his man-servant, nor his maid-servant, nor his ox, nor his ass, nor anything that is thy neighbor's.

children.name: be
children.sourceText: And it shall come to pass that all those who will not hear that prophet shall be cut off from among the people.

children.name: bondage
children.sourceText: I am the Lord thy God, who hath brought thee out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of bondage.

children.name: bow
children.sourceText: Thou shalt not bow down thyself unto them, nor serve them; for I the Lord thy God am a jealous God, visiting the iniquities of the fathers upon the children, unto the third and fourth generations of them that hate me; And showing mercy unto thousands of them that love me and keep my commandments.

children.name: brethren
children.sourceText: A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren, like unto me; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you.

children.name: brought
children.sourceText: I am the Lord thy God, who hath brought thee out of the land of Egypt, out of the house of bondage.

children.name: cattle
children.sourceText: Six days shalt thou labor, and do all thy work; But the seventh day, the sabbath of the Lord thy God, thou shalt not do any work, thou, nor thy son, nor thy daughter, thy man-servant, nor thy maid-servant, nor thy cattle, nor thy stranger that is within thy gates; For in six days the Lord made heaven and earth, and the sea, and all that in them is; wherefore the Lord blessed the sabbath day, and hallowed it.

children.sourceText: Thou shalt not bow down thyself unto them, nor serve them; for I the Lord thy God am a jealous God, visiting the iniquities of the fathers upon the children, unto the third and fourth generations of them that hate me; And showing mercy unto thousands of them that love me and keep my commandments.
